Query FANC tables in the CAVE annotation system

Source: R/cave.R
fanc_cave_query.Rd

Query FANC tables in the CAVE annotation system

fanc_cave_query(table, datastack_name = NULL, live = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

table

The name of the table to query

datastack_name

An optional CAVE datastack_name. If unset a sensible default is chosen.

live

Whether to use live query mode, which updates any root ids to their current value.

...

Additional arguments passed to flywire_cave_query

Value

A data.frame

See also

flywire_cave_query

Examples

# \donttest{
nuclei_aug2021ver2=fanc_cave_query(table = "nuclei_aug2021ver2")
head(nuclei_aug2021ver2)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 8
#>        id valid pt_supervoxel_id pt_root_id volume  pt_position bb_start_positi…
#>   <int64> <chr>          <int64>    <int64>  <dbl> <list<integ>  <list<integer>>
#> 1    7e16 t                 7e16       6e17   76.8          [3]              [3]
#> 2    7e16 t                 7e16       6e17   45.7          [3]              [3]
#> 3    7e16 t                 7e16       6e17   49.7          [3]              [3]
#> 4    7e16 t                 7e16       6e17   66.3          [3]              [3]
#> 5    7e16 t                 7e16       6e17   50.5          [3]              [3]
#> 6    7e16 t                 7e16       6e17   47.5          [3]              [3]
#> # … with 1 more variable: bb_end_position <list<integer>>
hist(nuclei_aug2021ver2$volume)

hist(nuclei_aug2021ver2$volume^(1/3))

# }
if (FALSE) {
points3d(xyzmatrix(nuclei_aug2021ver2$pt_position))
}
